name: Farmer Mole
description:
In Mole Farmer you play as a mole that is a gardener. 

Your mision, should you choose to accept it, is to ensure the tree survival until its madurity.

You must guide its roots to nearby water, breaking the ground in the process and defending it from parasites. All of this while you ensure the tree gets enough water.

In case not enough water is delivery, too many parasites living of the tree or the roots stop growing...that means failure, and...mole society do not tolerate failure.

Controls

   Move

   Pick/Use Tool

Tools

    To collect water and irrigate it at the root tip.

    To eliminate parasites when they stick to the root.

    To break rock bricks.

Credits
